Introduction

Hong Jin Ho is a South Korean musician under CREDIA Music & Artists. He is the cellist of the boy band Hoppípolla.

Hong Jin Ho graduated from Seoul National University (Bachelor in instrumental music) and Hochschule für Musik Würzburg (Master and PhD in instrumental music).

He won various music competitions in Korea, Italy, France and Germany.

In 2019, Hong Jin Ho joined JTBC's audition show SuperBand and won with his band Hoppípolla.

The band debuted on November 16, 2019 with the group's first digital single "About Time".
